summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6735 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 3, Plat of Sunrise Heights, and in Block 20, Sunrise Heights Addition Division Number 2, being a continuous alley between 34th Avenue Southwest and 32nd Avenue Southwest from Southwest Othello Street to Southwest Myrtle Street, and levying and assessing the amount thereof upon the property within the district; and establishing a local improvement fund.
